description: A delicious take on a toasty treat. Pear, blue cheese and walnut create a divine topping to level up your afternoon snack or beautiful brunch.
keywords: Pickled Pear, Blue Cheese & Walnut Crostini
name: Pickled Pear, Blue Cheese & Walnut Crostini Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 340 g Woolworths stone baked sourdough baguette

recipeInstructions.text: Top bread slices with cheese, pickled pear and walnuts. Serve drizzled with honey.
